definition: to climb a mountain/to scale a peak/mountain climbing/mountaineering

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]
to reach great heights (in technical skills or scholastic achievements)

sentences.english: Barro's anti-Keynesianism is at the extreme end.
sentences.chinese: 巴罗的反凯恩斯观点登峰造极。

sentences.english: Deception Point is pulse-pounding fiction at its best.
sentences.chinese: 《大骗局》是让脉搏狂飙的登峰造极之作。

sentences.english: The "mountain-top" experience seems to aim at reconfirming his mission of suffering on earth.
sentences.chinese: “登峰”的经验，似乎再次确认祂在世上受苦的使命。

sentences.english: At Acme Incorporated, customer service is our main focus.
sentences.chinese: 在登峰有限公司，客户服务是我们的重心。

sentences.english: Dengfeng is the leading factory specializing in producing air flow sensor.
sentences.chinese: 登峰是目前国内最大的专业生产空气流量计的厂家。

sentences.english: Today, the society is highly developed and the level of disguise also reaches a peak.
sentences.chinese: 时至今日，社会文明高度发达，伪饰也达到登峰造极。

sentences.english: This political pressure came to a head over the weekend in Reykjavik's parliament.
sentences.chinese: 这种政治压力在上周末的冰岛议会上登峰造极。

definition: perilous peak/the lofty heights
summit
to visit places famous for their scenery

Five Sacred Mountains of the Daoists, namely: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong, Mt Hua 華山|华山[Hua4 Shan1] in Shaanxi, Mt Heng 衡山[Heng2 Shan1] in Hunan, Mt Heng 恆山|恒山[Heng2 Shan1] in Shanxi, Mt Song 嵩山[Song1 Shan1] in Henan
to climb a mountain/climbing/mountaineering
to go up or down stairs step by step
Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
(lit. and fig.) towering/lofty/high
lofty mountain range
mountain ranges
stony mound/rocky mountain/lofty/towering
Cui Wei (1912-1979), actor, dramatist and movie director
Mt Song 嵩山 in Henan, one of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
steep and perilous path
summit/crest
the peaks of a mountain range
to hiss/to whistle
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]
